com.wuest.prefab.Base

Class ItemBlockCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.item.Item>
      • net.minecraft.item.Item
        • net.minecraft.item.ItemBlock
          • com.wuest.prefab.Base.ItemBlockCapability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.item.Item>

    public class ItemBlockCapability
extends net.minecraft.item.ItemBlock
    This class transfers the capabilities from the item to the tile entity associated with the block when it's placed.
    Author:
    WuestMan

      • placeBlockAt

        public boolean placeBlockAt(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                            net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                            net.minecraft.world.World world,
                            net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,

                            float hitX,
                            float hitY,
                            float hitZ,
                            net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState newState)
        Called to actually place the block, after the location is determined and all permission checks have been made.
        Overrides:
        placeBlockAt in class net.minecraft.item.ItemBlock
        Parameters:
        stack - The item stack that was used to place the block. This can be changed inside the method.
        player - The player who is placing the block. Can be null if the block is not being placed by a player.
        side - The side the player (or machine) right-clicked on.

      • setTileEntityCapabilities

        protected void setTileEntityCapabilities(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                         net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                                         net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                         net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                         net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side)
        Transfers the capability data from this item to the tile entity.
        Parameters:
        world - The world this is affecting.
        player - The controlling player.
        pos - The block pos of the placed block.
        stack - The item stack to set the tile entity capability for.
        side - The side for which to get the capability for.
